name: Hexblast
description: Detonate a [Curse] on every enemy in an area, causing explosions of [Chaos] damage but removing the [Curse]. Can only detonate [Curse|Curses] for which at least half of the duration has expired.

name: Flameblast
description: Channels to build up a large explosion. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion. The explosion occurs after using another skill or after a short period without casting.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A bolt of lightning strikes an area, dealing lightning damage.

name: Sunder
description: Slams the ground with a Mace, Sceptre, Axe or Staff, creating a wave of broken ground that damages enemies in an area in front of you. Enemies hit by the wave will release a circular shockwave, dealing damage to other enemies around them.

name: Leap Slam
description:
Jump into the air, damaging and [Knockback|Knocking Back] enemies with your mace where you land. Enemies you would land on are
